Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Really nice vibes and chill atmosphereü•≥

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: We got married at this spot, so this is truly an very special place for us. Although the days itself was wonderful, the way leading up to this was hard. Where in the beginning the possibilities where endless, we got surprised a lot of ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: We visited for lunch with our toddler. The pancakes are tasty and the staff friendly! They have a kids corner inside and lots of play area outside. Terrace looks great too. Everything is locally sourced, even the beers which are also tasty üòÅ

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Absolutely lovely restaurant. Run by lovers of life and the world. Great food. Easy atmosphere. During the week it's very quiet in winter. In the weekends you'll find a lively atmosphere. In summer there's an absolutely fantastic play area outside for kids.

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Family friend, the restaurant has such a nice atmosphere. The Staff is very friendly and the food is good. I love the biological concept. It's a nice place to visit in the winter and even better in the summer as they have a nice, sunny and spacious terrace.

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: We enjoyed a local beer (the brewmaster was on site), a fabulous traditional Dutch stew with locally sourced ingredients, and a fresh lox sandwich. Best of all was the play space where our daughter enjoyed "cooking" with the nice toys. Very friendly and delicious!

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Good food, great terrace and friendly personnel. Only could use some design love inside :)

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Best pannekoeken I've EVER had! And such a beautiful place! Our new favourite place in Amsterdam. We will come back as soon as possible <3 Dank je wel!

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Loved it! First impression very calming, extremely kidsfriendly. Amazing staff and extraordinary menu. Really enjoyed the ambiance, the location is great, with all the trees, plants and open air I felt I was visiting a secret garden. Deffinately a recomended!! Especially for families!

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Mmm, pancakes... Welcoming, friendly atmosphere. Needs more outdoor shade; we will be back for sure. Loved being able to see the food growing around us as we ate!

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Fun place to bring kids. Prices are a bit high for pancakes, but the quality is on the same level!

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Great place, kids can play outside (incl football pitch) while you're sitting on the terrace. Nice beers, great burger & pancakes!

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Cosy pancake restaurant (but they have other food e.g. Burgers too) with toys and coloring books for the kids and a large garden outside. Friendly and helpful personnel. And there's wifi üì∂

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Great place to have pancakes - not very cheap, but a nice experience with a pretty area for walks (with piglets, chickens and other childfriendly amusements) surrounding it.

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Nice place with a nice selection of beers and decent pancakes. Especially nice in the summer. Ideal for kids. It is quite pricey though.

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Lovely little pancake restaurant in the middle of a sportspark. Beware the location isn't directly accesable, you can park your car at the entrance of the sportspark.

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: hidden jam of Amsterdam north. Nice locally produced foods and beers, friendly hosts, releaxed atmosphere and tons of adventurous play options for the kids

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: If you have a bike on hire this is a great destination, very friendly and lovely pancakes

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Fun place, great pancakes

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: Great place, great atmosphere, great for the kids

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very special location, we spent an afternoon with the whole family grandchildren and grandparents. Suitable for anyone with good mobility. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super friendly people. Yesterday we had dinner with our 5 year old daughter. But above all a lot of friendliness. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Big terrace, bit strange place. But free parking and easily accessible. Large playground next to the terrace. Please reserve in advance. Although they are not difficult about this. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) We like to come and have a drink here. It is almost around the corner with us, but it is as if you are on holiday for a while. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop

Name: Proost & Stroop

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice people but lacking a sense of hygiene among employees. With your fingers, yes FINGERS to fish something out of a carafe of water and then serve it is really NOT DONE. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Excellent menu, friendly staff. Quality of the pancakes is very good too. There is not much to do outside for older children. Small tables, large space with many tables. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very nice cozy location, you imagine yourself in nature (Even though you are next to the A10), well-kicked outside terrace, good food, a bit at the price. A lot to do around it, such as a beautiful nature playground, ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) More than two years ago I have been here, albeit in the summer, when I enjoyed the sweet gluten-free (cheese and ginger) pancake. This time I decided for the savory version, but I did not like it. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) What a nice place, nice and quiet location and a beautiful terrace. The pancake with bacon, goat cheese, apple and walnut is divine. I have also eaten a super tasty piece of cake here before. The place is ideal for ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice location. We had a delicious dinner and also experienced a very nice evening. Especially the friendliness of the staff and the special snacks made the experience for us really complete.! ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A natural pancake with a few raisins on it costs ‚Ç¨ 8.00 and for a jug of tap water with a layer of lemonade syrup you have to pay ‚Ç¨ 6.75. Really again a typical Amsterdam (yuppen) tent where far too high and therefore ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Typical of the hospitality industry in Amsterdam today. It is more important to be hip and trendy than to deliver quality and service. Location is cool and meets hip standards: transforming an old dilapidated location ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) It takes a long time before your food arrives. They had also forgotten part of the order. I did not find pancake with sausage so special. It does have a nice terrace for a drink. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text:
(Translated by Google) Very pleasant place.
- On the terrace all day until sunset.

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super tasty pancakes and mega nice sweet pigs outside! There is also a playground for children so you can see and experience everything besides food :) ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very difficult to walk out of this store without buying anything üôà And the shop assistant Paulien is really great. So helpful and kind. Highly recommended. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The ideal place all year round! When the weather is nice on the terrace and when the weather is not so nice inside in the former football canteen. The pancakes are great! Enough play options for children. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Always good food in a beautiful location. With the nature playground it has become extra fun for the children. The Jorien pancake is highly recommended. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) For my daughter's 14th birthday we all went to eat at Stroop ... and it was a happy and enjoyable birthday! Made possible by the cordial service * a ten * and the excellent pancakes. Nice place. I say "go!". ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice food, nice beers, nice staff but slightly on the expensive side. Had a very pleasant and fun afternoon and evening! ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very nice restaurant in an unexpected location in Noord. Friendly atmosphere, smooth and friendly service, very tasty locally oriented and organic food for a good price. Also playground for children, easily accessible ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Is a bit hidden but quite cozy to eat a pancake. Staff a bit absent-minded but friendly. Price quality fine. To be repeated. ‚Ä¶

Name: Proost & Stroop
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious pancakes, surprisingly different. Wait a little too long with children. But will come because everything is freshly baked. ‚Ä¶
